description: AbstractFeatureWithLifespan is the base class for all features. This class allows the optional specification of the real-world and database times for the existence of each feature.

properties.name: creationDate
properties.description: Indicates the date and time at which the feature was added to the database.

properties.name: terminationDate
properties.description: Indicates the date and time at which the feature was removed from the database.

properties.name: validFrom
properties.description: Indicates the date and time at which the feature started to exist in the real world.

properties.name: validTo
properties.description: Indicates the date and time at which the feature ended to exist in the real world.
